componentDescription: An unstyled option to be used within a Select.

propDescriptions.component: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propDescriptions.disabled: If true, the option will be disabled.
propDescriptions.label: A text representation of the option's content. Used for keyboard text navigation matching.
propDescriptions.slotProps: The props used for each slot inside the Option.
propDescriptions.slots: The components used for each slot inside the Option. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component. See Slots API below for more details.

root.description: Class name applied to the root element.

slotDescriptions.root: The component that renders the root.
